data.title: Capitalism, Socialism and Communism
data.meta_description: Capitalism, Socialism and Communism - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses key aspects of capitalism including private ownership of capital goods and production for profit. It outlines factors of production, types of goods, and the role of money, capital accumulation, and financial markets. Wage labor and class structures are also examined. Different types of capitalism are defined such as mercantilism, free market capitalism, and social market economies.
